title: Toddler Baby Boys Girls House Slipper Cute Dinosaur Unicorn Cartoon Soft Anti-Slip Winter Shoes (Toddler/Little Kid)
features: ENJOY SUPERB COMFORT: These closed back slip-on for boys are cushioned with a fleece foam upper and insole to provide a soft and cloudy sensation, allowing your child to walk, lounge, and play while feeling comfy all day long.

ADORABLE EXTERIOR: No kids or toddlers could keep their eyes off these cute cartoon-designed slippers. They are adorable enough to awaken their thirst to possess one , easy to pair with any wears or suits and excellent for both indoor and outdoor use.
SLIP RESISTANT RUBBER OUTSOLE - Provides the right amount of traction to the slippers, so he can walk or run without slipping or sliding.
ALL YEAR ROUND: These slippers provide your child some warmth during chilly seasons and enough insulation on sunny days, making it an all-weather pair of slip-on.

MADE TO LAST: Made of sensible and long-lasting blends so so he can enjoy these comfy slippers for many years to come. EASY WEAR: A closed back, round toe pair of slippers that's easy to slip-on so your kid can wear it in just a breeze. Ideal for both indoor and outdoor use.
